  • Method Details

    • appointmentInsert

      public static void appointmentInsert(String title, String description, String location, String type, String start, String end, String createDate, String createdBy, String lastUpdate, String lastUpdatedBy, int customerID, int userID, int contactID) throws SQLException
      Takes in parameters and passes them into an SQL query to insert appointment information.
      Parameters:
      title - appointment title
      description - appointment description
      location - appointment location
      type - appointment type
      start - appointment start timedate
      end - appointment end timedate
      createDate - appointment create date
      createdBy - appointment creater
      lastUpdate - appointment update date
      lastUpdatedBy - appointment updater user
      customerID - customer ID of the appointment's customer
      userID - appointment user's ID
      contactID - appointment contact's ID
      Throws:
      SQLException

    • appointmentUpdate

      public static void appointmentUpdate(String title, String description, String location, String type, String start, String end, String lastUpdate, String lastUpdatedBy, int customerID, int userID, int contactID, int appointmentID) throws SQLException
      Takes in a list of parameters and passes to a query that updates the existing appointment based on Appointment ID.

    • selectMonthly

      public static ResultSet selectMonthly(int month, int year) throws SQLException
      Takes in 2 parameters and queries for appointments with those as the date start.
      Parameters:
      month - user selected month
      year - user selected year
      Returns:
      a result set of the month and year selected, of appointments.
      Throws:
      SQLException

      Parameters:

      Returns:
      return the ID of the selected contact
      Throws:
      SQLException

    • selectContactName

      public static String selectContactName(int contactID) throws SQLException
      To Modify an appointment, this function is used to query the name from an ID.
      Parameters:
      contactID - ID of the contact selected.
      Returns:
      returns a String of the contact's name.
      Throws:
      SQLException

    • selectUser

      public static int selectUser() throws SQLException
      Assigns the user of the appointment to the currently logged-in user. Gets a result set and gets the only result.
      Returns:
      returns integer ID of the logged in user.
      Throws:
      SQLException

    • getTypeList

      public static ResultSet getTypeList() throws SQLException
      Throws:
      SQLException

    • timesOverlap

      public static boolean timesOverlap(int customerID, String startDatetime, String endDatetime) throws SQLException
      Used to determine if a pair of datetime inputs (start and end) overlap with existing appointments. This DOES allow for appointments to start right when another ends, e.g 8AM - 9AM works with 9AM to 10AM
      Parameters:
      customerID - ID of the customer we're looking at appointments for
      startDatetime - start datetime of input
      endDatetime - end datetime of input
      Returns:
      returns true if there is an overlap, false if not
      Throws:
      SQLException

    • isOutOfHours

      public static boolean isOutOfHours(String dateTimeStart, String dateTimeEnd)
      Determines if an appointment's start and end time are in business hours.
      Parameters:
      dateTimeStart - appointment start datetime
      dateTimeEnd - appointment end datetime
      Returns:
      true if the times are out of business hours, false if within.

    • appointmentAddClick

      public void appointmentAddClick() throws IOException
      Loads the scene to add appointments.
      Throws:
      IOException

    • appointmentModifyClick

      public void appointmentModifyClick()
      Loads the scene to modify appointments based on the tableview selected item. Uses initAppointmentData to "move" data into the other class to be prefilled with the selected data.

    • appointmentDeleteClick

      public void appointmentDeleteClick()
      Deletes an appointment based on appointment ID.

      Takes a string parameter and opens the FXML of that name into a new scene window.
      Parameters:
      screenName - filename of the FXML file being loaded.
      Throws:
      IOException

    • logoutClick

      public void logoutClick() throws IOException
      Logs the user out by loading into the login screen. Assigns login_screen's loggedUser to null.
      Throws:
      IOException

    • homeClick

      public void homeClick() throws IOException
      Loads the home screen scene window using its fxml file.

      IOException

    • customersClick

      public void customersClick() throws IOException
      Loads the customers scene window using its fxml file.
      Throws:
      IOException

    • setRadioAll

      public void setRadioAll()
      Linked to the All-TABLES radio button. Hides all tableview and elements not related to showing ALL appointment data. Gets the data again to refresh the table.

    • setRadioMonthly

      public void setRadioMonthly()
      Linked to the monthly radio button. Hides all tableview and elements not related to showing monthly appointment data. Gets the data again to refresh the table.

    • setRadioWeekly

      public void setRadioWeekly()
      Linked to the weekly radio button. Hides all tableview and elements not related to showing weekly appointment data. Gets the data again to refresh the table.

    • getData

      public void getData()
      Gets data for all appointments. Dynamically creates the columns and fills them for appointments, based on the Result Set queried. Receives the data and then puts it into the observable list, then setting the Tableview with that list.

    • getDataMonthly

      public void getDataMonthly()
      Variation of the getData function that queries for a result set based on month and year.

    • getDataWeekly

      public void getDataWeekly()
      Variation of the getData function that queries for a result set based on current week.

    • refreshTable

      public void refreshTable()
      Refreshes all tables by calling their version of the getData method.

    • initialize

      public void initialize()
      Defaults to settings to display all appointments.
